title: UCI Fines Giulio Ciccone for Tossing Sunglasses Into Crowd After Winning Stage 1 of the Tour of the Alps
content:
The Italian’s signature celebration is back after a two-year cold streak — but the powers that be aren’t terribly happy about it.

Read the full article at UCI Fines Giulio Ciccone for Tossing Sunglasses Into Crowd After Winning Stage 1 of the Tour of the Alps on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
